trans-unit.source: Provides methods for a subscription service to manage subscriptions for a workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para um serviço de assinatura para gerenciar assinaturas para um tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowSubscriptionService is the base class for any subscription service classes used in the Workflow Foundation (WF).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowSubscriptionService é a classe base para as classes de serviço de assinatura usado no Workflow Foundation (WF).

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService"></xref> that the workflow runtime created the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService"> </xref> que o tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho criado especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"></xref> that the workflow runtime created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"> </xref> que criou o tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService"></xref> that the workflow runtime deleted the subscription associated with the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService"> </xref> que o tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho excluído assinatura associada com o GUID especificado.

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the subscription that the workflow runtime deleted.
trans-unit.target: O GUID da assinatura que o tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho é excluído.
